direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods enable and disable the fast withdraw feature, sharing similar control flows and parameter handling.
Both methods involve operations related to withdrawals, sharing similar resource access patterns.
Both methods modify the account state, albeit in different contexts, and share similar dependency on account-related operations.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the initialization of the RequestHandler for API requests.
Environment setup is required before enabling or disabling fast withdraw, ensuring the API key has the necessary permissions.
Both methods should verify the account status and handle similar exceptions related to account permissions.
